mapper.insert: insert into t_user_staff (id, username, realname, status, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
